9enum
10{
11 Value_Null = 0,
12 Value_Integer,
13 Value_Float,
14 Value_String,
15 Value_Any,
16 Value_Code,
17 Value_Macro,
18 Value_Ident,
19 Value_CString,
20 Value_CAny,
21 Value_Word,
22 Value_Pop,
23 Value_Cond,
24};
25
26enum
27{
28 Id_Var, //1
29 Id_FloatVar,
30 Id_StringVar,
31 Id_Command,
32 Id_Alias, //5
33 Id_Local,
34 Id_Do,
35 Id_DoArgs,
36 Id_If,
37 Id_Result, //10
38 Id_Not,
39 Id_And,
40 Id_Or, //13
41};
42
43enum
44{
45 Idf_Persist = 1<<0,
46 Idf_Override = 1<<1,
47 Idf_Hex = 1<<2,
48 Idf_ReadOnly = 1<<3,
49 Idf_Overridden = 1<<4,
50 Idf_Unknown = 1<<5,
51 Idf_Arg = 1<<6,
52};
53
54struct ident;
55
56struct identval
57{
58 union
59 {
60 int i; // Id_Var, ValueInteger
61 float f; // Id_FloatVar, ValueFloat
62 char *s; // Id_StringVar, ValueString
63 const uint *code; // ValueCode
64 ident *id; // ValueIdent
65 const char *cstr; // ValueCString
66 };
67};
68
69struct tagval : identval
70{
71 int type;
72
73 void setint(int val)
74 {
75 type = Value_Integer;
76 i = val;
77 }
78
79 void setfloat(float val)
80 {
81 type = Value_Float;
82 f = val;
83 }
84
85 void setnumber(double val)
86 {
87 i = static_cast<int>(val);
88 if(val == i)
89 {
90 type = Value_Integer;
91 }
92 else
93 {
94 type = Value_Float;
95 f = val;
96 }
97 }
98
99 void setstr(char *val)
100 {
101 type = Value_String;
102 s = val;
103 }
104
105 void setnull()
106 {
107 type = Value_Null;
108 i = 0;
109 }
110
111 void setcode(const uint *val)
112 {
113 type = Value_Code;
114 code = val;
115 }
116
117 void setmacro(const uint *val)
118 {
119 type = Value_Macro;
120 code = val;
121 }
122
123 void setcstr(const char *val)
124 {
125 type = Value_CString;
126 cstr = val;
127 }
128
129 void setident(ident *val)
130 {
131 type = Value_Ident;
132 id = val;
133 }
134
135 const char *getstr() const;
136 int getint() const;
137 float getfloat() const;
138 double getnumber() const;
139 bool getbool() const;
140 void getval(tagval &r) const;
141
142 void cleanup();
143};
144
145struct identstack
146{
147 identval val;
148 int valtype;
149 identstack *next;
150};
151
152typedef void (__cdecl *identfun)(ident *id);
153
154struct ident
155{
156 //this pointer will point to different types depending upon the type of variable
157 union identvalptr
158 {
159 void *p; // ID_*VAR
160 int *i; // Id_Var
161 float *f; // Id_FloatVar
162 char **s; // Id_StringVar
163 };
164
165 uchar type; // one of ID_* above
166 union
167 {
168 uchar valtype; // Id_Alias
169 uchar numargs; // Id_Command
170 };
171 ushort flags;
172 int index;
173 const char *name;
174 union
175 {
176 struct // Id_Var, Id_FloatVar, Id_StringVar
177 {
178 union //number var range union type
179 {
180 struct
181 {
182 int minval,
183 maxval;
184 }; // Id_Var
185 struct
186 {
187 float minvalf,
188 maxvalf;
189 }; // Id_FloatVar
190 };
191 identvalptr storage;
192 identval overrideval;
193 };
194 struct // Id_Alias
195 {
196 uint *code;
197 identval val;
198 identstack *stack;
199 };
200 struct // Id_Command
201 {
202 const char *args;
203 uint argmask;
204 };
205 };
206 identfun fun; // Id_Var, Id_FloatVar, Id_StringVar, Id_Command
207
208 ident() {}
209 // Id_Var
210 ident(int t, const char *n, int m, int x, int *s, void *f = nullptr, int flags = 0)
211 : type(t), flags(flags | (m > x ? Idf_ReadOnly : 0)), name(n), minval(m), maxval(x), fun((identfun)f)
212 { storage.i = s; }
213
214 // Id_FloatVar
215 ident(int t, const char *n, float m, float x, float *s, void *f = nullptr, int flags = 0)
216 : type(t), flags(flags | (m > x ? Idf_ReadOnly : 0)), name(n), minvalf(m), maxvalf(x), fun((identfun)f)
217 { storage.f = s; }
218
219 // Id_StringVar
220 ident(int t, const char *n, char **s, void *f = nullptr, int flags = 0)
221 : type(t), flags(flags), name(n), fun((identfun)f)
222 { storage.s = s; }
223
224 // Id_Alias
225 ident(int t, const char *n, char *a, int flags)
226 : type(t), valtype(Value_String), flags(flags), name(n), code(nullptr), stack(nullptr)
227 { val.s = a; }
228
229 ident(int t, const char *n, int a, int flags)
230 : type(t), valtype(Value_Integer), flags(flags), name(n), code(nullptr), stack(nullptr)
231 { val.i = a; }
232
233 ident(int t, const char *n, float a, int flags)
234 : type(t), valtype(Value_Float), flags(flags), name(n), code(nullptr), stack(nullptr)
235 { val.f = a; }
236
237 ident(int t, const char *n, int flags)
238 : type(t), valtype(Value_Null), flags(flags), name(n), code(nullptr), stack(nullptr)
239 {}
240 ident(int t, const char *n, const tagval &v, int flags)
241 : type(t), valtype(v.type), flags(flags), name(n), code(nullptr), stack(nullptr)
242 { val = v; }
243
244 // Id_Command
245 ident(int t, const char *n, const char *args, uint argmask, int numargs, void *f = nullptr, int flags = 0)
246 : type(t), numargs(numargs), flags(flags), name(n), args(args), argmask(argmask), fun((identfun)f)
247 {}
248
249 void changed()
250 {
251 if(fun)
252 {
253 fun(this);
254 }
255 }
256
257 void setval(const tagval &v)
258 {
259 valtype = v.type;
260 val = v;
261 }
262
263 void setval(const identstack &v)
264 {
265 valtype = v.valtype;
266 val = v.val;
267 }
268
269 void forcenull()
270 {
271 if(valtype==Value_String)
272 {
273 delete[] val.s;
274 }
275 valtype = Value_Null;
276 }
277
278 float getfloat() const;
279 int getint() const;
280 double getnumber() const;
281 const char *getstr() const;
282 void getval(tagval &r) const;
283 void getcstr(tagval &v) const;
284 void getcval(tagval &v) const;
285};

297inline int parseint(const char *s)
298{
299 return static_cast<int>(strtoul(s, nullptr, 0));
300}

343
344// nasty macros for registering script functions, abuses globals to avoid excessive infrastructure
345
346//* note: many of the VARF comments are very repetitive, because the code itself is nearly duplicated too *//
347
348/* how command registration works:
349 * In C++, all global variables must be initiated before main() is called
350 * Each of these macro kludges (which are placed at the global scope level) initializes some kind of global variable
351 * Because the macro kludges are the definition of global variables, at program initializiation, they must be run first
352 * The values of the variables themselves don't matter because they only exist to cheat and run before main()
353 * The macro kludges themselves register commands or values within some vector<>-s which keeps track of all cmds/vars
354 */
355
356//command macros
357#define KEYWORD(name, type) static bool dummy_##type = addcommand(#name, (identfun)nullptr, nullptr, type)
358#define COMMANDKN(name, type, fun, nargs) static bool dummy_##fun = addcommand(#name, (identfun)fun, nargs, type)
359#define COMMANDK(name, type, nargs) COMMANDKN(name, type, name, nargs)
360#define COMMANDN(name, fun, nargs) COMMANDKN(name, Id_Command, fun, nargs)
361#define COMMAND(name, nargs) COMMANDN(name, name, nargs)
362
363//integer var macros
364//VAR_, _VARF, VARM_ are templates for "normal" macros that do not execute an inline function
365#define VAR_(name, global, min, cur, max, persist) int global = variable(#name, min, cur, max, &global, nullptr, persist)
366#define VARN(name, global, min, cur, max) VAR_(name, global, min, cur, max, 0)
367#define VARNP(name, global, min, cur, max) VAR_(name, global, min, cur, max, Idf_Persist)
368#define VARNR(name, global, min, cur, max) VAR_(name, global, min, cur, max, Idf_Override)
369#define VAR(name, min, cur, max) VAR_(name, name, min, cur, max, 0)
370#define VARP(name, min, cur, max) VAR_(name, name, min, cur, max, Idf_Persist)
371#define VARR(name, min, cur, max) VAR_(name, name, min, cur, max, Idf_Override)
372
373//variable with inline function to be executed on change (VARiable with Function = VARF)
374#define VARF_(name, global, min, cur, max, body, persist) \
375 int global = variable(#name, min, cur, max, &global, [] (ident *) { body; }, persist); /* assign variable, needs fxn prototype declared above */
376
377#define VARFN(name, global, min, cur, max, body) VARF_(name, global, min, cur, max, body, 0)
378#define VARF(name, min, cur, max, body) VARF_(name, name, min, cur, max, body, 0)
379#define VARFP(name, min, cur, max, body) VARF_(name, name, min, cur, max, body, Idf_Persist)
380#define VARFR(name, min, cur, max, body) VARF_(name, name, min, cur, max, body, Idf_Override)
381#define VARFNP(name, global, min, cur, max, body) VARF_(name, global, min, cur, max, body, Idf_Persist)
382
383//hexadecimal var macros
384#define HVAR_(name, global, min, cur, max, persist) int global = variable(#name, min, cur, max, &global, nullptr, persist | Idf_Hex)
385#define HVARP(name, min, cur, max) HVAR_(name, name, min, cur, max, Idf_Persist)
386
387//hex variable with function to be executed on change (Hexadecimal VARiable with Function = HVARF)
388//the CVAR series of macros borrows the HVARF macro as it deals with hex colors
389#define HVARF_(name, global, min, cur, max, body, persist) \
390 int global = variable(#name, min, cur, max, &global, [] (ident *) { body; }, persist | Idf_Hex); /* assign variable, needs fxn prototype declared above */
391
392//color var macros
393#define CVAR_(name, cur, init, body, persist) bvec name = bvec::hexcolor(cur); HVARF_(name, _##name, 0, cur, 0xFFFFFF, { init; name = bvec::hexcolor(_##name); body; }, persist)
394#define CVARP(name, cur) CVAR_(name, cur, , , Idf_Persist)
395#define CVARR(name, cur) CVAR_(name, cur, , , Idf_Override)
396#define CVARFP(name, cur, body) CVAR_(name, cur, , body, Idf_Persist)
397#define CVAR0_(name, cur, body, persist) CVAR_(name, cur, { if(!_##name) _##name = cur; }, body, persist)
398#define CVAR0R(name, cur) CVAR0_(name, cur, , Idf_Override)
399#define CVAR1_(name, cur, body, persist) CVAR_(name, cur, { if(_##name <= 255) _##name |= (_##name<<8) | (_##name<<16); }, body, persist)
400#define CVAR1R(name, cur) CVAR1_(name, cur, , Idf_Override)
401#define CVAR1FR(name, cur, body) CVAR1_(name, cur, body, Idf_Override)
402
403//float var macros
404#define FVAR_(name, global, min, cur, max, persist) float global = fvariable(#name, min, cur, max, &global, nullptr, persist)
405#define FVARNP(name, global, min, cur, max) FVAR_(name, global, min, cur, max, Idf_Persist)
406#define FVAR(name, min, cur, max) FVAR_(name, name, min, cur, max, 0)
407#define FVARP(name, min, cur, max) FVAR_(name, name, min, cur, max, Idf_Persist)
408#define FVARR(name, min, cur, max) FVAR_(name, name, min, cur, max, Idf_Override)
409
410//float variable with function to be executed on change (Float VARiable with Function = FVARF)
411#define FVARF_(name, global, min, cur, max, body, persist) \
412 float global = fvariable(#name, min, cur, max, &global, [] (ident *) { body; }, persist); /* assign variable, needs fxn prototype declared above */ \
413
414#define FVARF(name, min, cur, max, body) FVARF_(name, name, min, cur, max, body, 0)
415#define FVARFP(name, min, cur, max, body) FVARF_(name, name, min, cur, max, body, Idf_Persist)
416#define FVARFR(name, min, cur, max, body) FVARF_(name, name, min, cur, max, body, Idf_Override)
417
418//string var macros
419#define SVAR_(name, global, cur, persist) char *global = svariable(#name, cur, &global, nullptr, persist)
420#define SVAR(name, cur) SVAR_(name, name, cur, 0)
421#define SVARP(name, cur) SVAR_(name, name, cur, Idf_Persist)
422#define SVARR(name, cur) SVAR_(name, name, cur, Idf_Override)
423
424//string variable with function to be executed on change (Float VARiable with Function = FVARF)
425#define SVARF_(name, global, cur, body, persist) \
426 char *global = svariable(#name, cur, &global, [] (ident *) { body; }, persist); /* assign variable, needs fxn prototype declared above */
427
428#define SVARF(name, cur, body) SVARF_(name, name, cur, body, 0)
429#define SVARFR(name, cur, body) SVARF_(name, name, cur, body, Idf_Override)
430
431
432//inline command macros
433#define ICOMMANDNAME(name) _icmd_##name
434#define ICOMMANDSNAME _icmds_
435
436//create lambda and use as function pointer, then dereference it to cast as identfun
437//unary + operator on lambda used to degrade it to a function pointer
438#define ICOMMANDKNS(name, type, cmdname, nargs, proto, b) \
439 bool cmdname = addcommand(name, reinterpret_cast<identfun>(+[] proto { b; }), nargs, type); \
440
441#define ICOMMANDKN(name, type, cmdname, nargs, proto, b) ICOMMANDKNS(#name, type, cmdname, nargs, proto, b)
442#define ICOMMANDK(name, type, nargs, proto, b) ICOMMANDKN(name, type, ICOMMANDNAME(name), nargs, proto, b)
443#define ICOMMANDNS(name, cmdname, nargs, proto, b) ICOMMANDKNS(name, Id_Command, cmdname, nargs, proto, b)
444#define ICOMMANDN(name, cmdname, nargs, proto, b) ICOMMANDNS(#name, cmdname, nargs, proto, b)
445#define ICOMMAND(name, nargs, proto, b) ICOMMANDN(name, ICOMMANDNAME(name), nargs, proto, b)
446
447#endif /* COMMAND_H_ */
